title: Microfinance sector to stabilise by Q4 amidst current challenges & new regulations
description: The microfinance sector is expected to stabilize by the end of the third quarter, with improvements anticipated from the fourth quarter onward due to new measures adopted by lenders. However, the sector is currently facing challenges, including high portfolio risk and elevated credit costs, which are likely to persist into the second quarter.
